title: Stabilization of residual mercury from gold mining as metacinnabar and cinnabar in ball mills on a pilot scale
content:
Publication date: 30 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 14

Author(s): Pablo Cesar Neyra Avellaneda, Reider Benigno Zarate Sulca, Hilda Beatriz Magallanes Camasca, Bernardette Mariella Sencebe Bastante de Garcia, Javier Fortunato Pujaico Lizarbe, Lena Asunción Téllez Monzón, Lisveth Flores del Pino, José Edmundo Huerta Alatrista, Paola Jorge-Montalvo, Lizardo Visitación-Figueroa
